name: Washboard Willie
description: '''William Paden Hensley''' (July 24, 1906 or 1909 â€“ August 24, 1991), known as '''Washboard Willie''', was an American [[Detroit blues]] musician, who specialised in playing the [[washboard (musical instrument)|washboard]]. He recorded tracks including "A Fool on a Mule in the Middle of The Road" plus "Cherry Red Blues", and worked variously with [[Eddie "Guitar" Burns]], [[Baby Boy Warren]], and [[Boogie Woogie Red]].
